level.text: This chapter establishes uniform requirements for transferring money or other things of value to recipients outside the District government, where the Department is authorized to make grants.
The Director of the Department of Human Services, or his or her designee, is authorized to make a grant where:
A statute authorizes the Department to support or stimulate the activity of the recipient;
The Department will not be substantially involved in the activity so supported or stimulated; and
The Department is not acquiring any property or service of direct use to the District government.
The Department is authorized to make grants pursuant to the Saint Elizabeth’s Hospital and District of Columbia Mental Health Services Act.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is the Saint Elizabeth’s Hospital and District of Columbia Mental Health Services Act, D.C. Code, 2001 Ed. § 44-901 et seq.; and Mayor’s Order 92-64 (May 19, 1992).
